name: Samuel
descriptions: Samuel is a feral glowing one in 2277, found behind Takoma Industrial.

Samuel will appear after reading the observation files on the terminal in Isabella Proud's camp. He is mentioned as being the "alpha male" of a group of feral ghouls that were being studied by Isabella. She suspected that he was the alpha because the other ghouls were drawn to his radioactivity.
Despite being named, Samuel is aggressive and will attack any non-ghoul on sight.
